abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Education for All-Fast Track Initiative Project for Benin is
            to contribute to expanding equitable access to pre-school
            and primary education and to supporting the development of
            literacy programs, while improving quality and retention at
            primary level as well as the management of the sector. The
            extension will allow the project to complete the following
            activities, which are crucial to the full attainment of the
            project development objective (PDO): (i) construction of
            schools, latrines and literacy centers that experienced
            delays due to heavy rain, affecting the number of project
            beneficiaries and percentage of females; (ii) literacy
            activities for which the signing of the contracts with some
            non-government organizations (NGOs) is finally underway,
            affecting the number of people to pass an initial or
            post-literacy training; (iii) teacher training, affecting
            the number of additional qualified teachers; and (iv) the
            establishment of a computerized framework for a subsequent
            full information management system. The closing date of the
            project will be extension from December 30, 2011 to June 15, 2012.
